des: "A delightful and healthy smoothie bowl. Great for breakfast on a hot day or an afternoon snack. I garnish mine with coconut chips, extra fruit, and sometimes granola. Fresh fruit can be used in place of frozen; add 1 cup of ice for blending."
ins: Combine yogurt, coconut water, strawberries, peaches, mango, banana, and 1 tablespoon chia seeds in a blender; blend until smooth. Pour smoothie into a bowl and top with remaining 1 tablespoon chia seeds.
